data.title: Catalogue
data.meta_description: BBC Film have been developing films and talent for over 25 years
data.text:
A

A Christmas Carol

Released 11 December 2018

Simon Callow brings his acclaimed one-man version of Charles Dickensâ beloved classic to the big screen.

A Cock and Bull Story

Released 20 January 2006

The film of the 'unfilmable' novel by Laurence Sterne.

A Little Chaos

Released 17 April 2015

A female landscape gardener overcomes the demands of her new role, and her heart.

A Long Way Down

Released 21 March 2014

The irreverent hit novel by Nick Hornby adapted for the big screen.

A Room for Romeo Brass

Released 4 February 2000

A Running Jump

Released 25 June 2012

Released 25 November 2016
